DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect test toothpaste contain 1150 part per million ( ppm ) fluoride ( F ) mineral content demineralize enamel specimen , situ caries model system , compare difference net remineralization change ( Î”M ) follow use test toothpaste fluoride free ( 0 ppm F ) reference control toothpaste .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Efficacy Fluoride Toothpastes Using In Situ Caries Model
DOC.criteria: 1 . Demonstrates understand study . 2 . Aged 18 85 year . 3 . Understands willing , able likely comply study procedure restriction . 4 . Has good general health ( opinion investigator medically qualify designee ) . 5 . Currently live Indianapolis , Indiana area . 6 . Currently wear removable mandibular partial denture sufficient room posterior buccal flange area accommodate two enamel specimen . 7 . Have current active caries periodontal disease restoration good state repair . 8 . Have salivary flow rate range normal value . 1 . Pregnant breast feed woman . 2 . Known suspected intolerance hypersensitivity study material state ingredient . 3 . Currently take antibiotic take antibiotic two week prior screen visit . 4 . Unable measure product weight accurately use assign study scale determine study staff demonstrate . 5 . Participation another clinical study receipt investigational drug within 30 day screen visit . 6 . Have receive professional fluoride treatment within 14 day randomization first treatment . 7 . Recent history ( within last year ) alcohol substance abuse .
